generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the primary surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area next to the road, separated by a curb, where pedestrians are walking, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: A multi-story building with a distinct architectural style is visible in the background, which qualifies as a building.
- wall: A stone wall runs along the right side of the image, which is an individual standing wall.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the left side of the road, which qualifies as a fence.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one supporting traffic signs and others for streetlights.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are present, including directional signs for "Domplatz" and "Polizei", as well as a "Parkleitsystem" sign.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible throughout the image, which qualifies as vegetation.
- terrain: There is a patch of grass visible near the sidewalk on the right side of the image, which qualifies as terrain.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk, including adults and children.
- car: A silver car is visible on the road, and a black car is partially visible on the left side of the road.
- bus: A large white bus with "Gut" and "ell" written on its side is visible parked on the side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked near the bus stop area.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked near the bus stop area.
